snippet: Thousands of illegal immigrants cross into Greece from Turkey along the six-mile stretch of land where the razor-wire-topped fence will be built.
abstract: Greece will soon begin building a six-mile-long fence topped with razor wire on its border with Turkey to deter entry by illegal immigrants; the fence will be coupled with a network of fixed night-vision cameras providing real-time video to a new command center, and will block a short stretch of dry land between the two countries; Turkey has not opposed the building of the fence.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of illegal immigrants cross into Greece from Turkey along the six-mile stretch of land where the razor-wire-topped fence will be built.

headline.seo: Greece to Build Fence on Turkish Border to Curb Illegal Immigrants
headline.main: Greece to Build Border Fence to Deter Illegal Immigrants
headline.print_headline: Greece to Build Border Fence To Deter Illegal Immigrants
